Package org.forgerock.openidm.provisioner.openicf.impl

Class ConnectorInfoProviderService

java.lang.Object
org.forgerock.openidm.provisioner.openicf.impl.ConnectorInfoProviderService
All Implemented Interfaces:
MetaDataProvider, ConnectorConfigurationHelper, ConnectorInfoProvider
public class ConnectorInfoProviderService extends Object implements ConnectorInfoProvider, MetaDataProvider, ConnectorConfigurationHelper
The ConnectorInfoProviderService initiates the the embedded OpenICF and makes it available as a service.

    • getPropertiesToEncrypt

      public List<org.forgerock.json.JsonPointer> getPropertiesToEncrypt(String pidOrFactory, String instanceAlias, org.forgerock.json.JsonValue config) throws WaitForMetaData
      Meta-data describing which configuration properties need to be encrypted for a given configuration.
      Specified by:
      getPropertiesToEncrypt in interface MetaDataProvider
      Parameters:
      pidOrFactory - the PID of either the managed service; or for factory configuration the PID of the Managed Service Factory
      instanceAlias - null for plain managed service, or the subname (alias) for the managed factory configuration newBuilder
      config - the new configuration that is being set. May or may not already have encrypted values.
      Returns:
      a list of configuration properties (identified by JSON pointers) that need to be encrypted if this MetaDataProvider is responsible for this configuration. Empty list if none should be encrypted. Null if this provider is not responsible for this configuration.
      Throws:
      WaitForMetaData - thrown if this provider knows that the given configuration has associated meta-data, but the meta-data is not yet available.

    • setCallback
